name: 梁文耀
objective: 本實習介紹ARM CPU 及以ARM CPU為核心之微算機系統。內容包含：ARM 之C 語言工具，ARM 發展環境，Evaluation board 之介紹，Emulator之介紹，ARM 之C 語言程式撰寫及偵錯，利用C 語言控制I/O，ARM 之組合語言程式撰寫及偵錯，合併C及組合語言之程式，中斷之使用，串列I/O及並列I/O之使用， A/D及D/A轉換之使用，及期末小專題。
schedule:
Week 1	Lecture: Microprocessors Input and Output
Week 2	Lecture: Embedded Microprocessor Platform and Interfaces
　	Lab 1: Setup the Experiment Environment
Week 3	Lecture: Linux and Linux Programming
　	Lab 2: Linux related commands exercises
Week 4	Lab 3: uClinux install, Hello World, Download, and 	Application Development
Week 5	Lecture: Memory-mapped IO and GPIO
　 ~ 6	Lab 4: LED running horse
Week 7	Lecture: The Memory Subsystem
　 ~ 8	Lab 5: 7-Seg digital clock with RTC
Week 9	Midterm Exam
Week 10	Lecture: LCD and Touch Panel
　 ~ 11	Lab 6: Drawing pad with touch screen and LCD
Week 12	Lecture: Keyboards
　 ~ 13	Lab 7: PDA calculator with key-pad and touch screen
Week 14	Term Projects
　 ~ 16
Week 17	Term Project Check
Week 18	Final Exam
